alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 19 at 1:28AM PST until December 19 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will mainly be confined to wind-sheltered valleys in Skamania County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
